notes: Function calls (math and time) in streaming mode - this tests the challenging scenario of tool calls with streaming
requestBody: {"tools":[{"type":"function","description":"Perform mathematical calculations","parameters":{"required":["expression"],"properties":{"expression":{"description":"Mathematical expression to evaluate","type":"string"}},"type":"object"},"name":"calculate_math"},{"type":"function","description":"Get the current time in a specific timezone","parameters":{"type":"object","required":["timezone"],"properties":{"timezone":{"type":"string","description":"Timezone identifier (e.g., 'America\/New_York')"}}},"name":"get_current_time"}],"stream":true,"max_output_tokens":200,"model":"gpt-5-nano","input":[{"content":[{"text":"You are a helpful assistant with math and time capabilities.","type":"input_text"}],"role":"system"},{"content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"Calculate the square root of 144, then tell me the current time in Tokyo timezone."}],"role":"user"}]}
